rooms.description: Spacious entry with wheelchair-accessible ramp and wide door openings. Decorated in Chettinad style with intricate wood carvings.
Open plan living area with integrated kitchenette. High ceiling design featuring traditional Chettinad detailing and natural light from large windows.
Adjacent to the living room for family gatherings. Designed with wheelchair access in mind and Vastu-aligned positioning.
Spacious master bedroom featuring en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Designed with natural light and Vastu guidelines.
Additional bedroom designed for joint family use. Includes provisions for wheelchair access.
Another bedroom in line with Chettinad style detailing. Accessible layout for joint family.
Family bedroom to accommodate the extended family. Includes ample space and wheelchair access.
Additional bedroom for joint family requirements with Vastu-compliant placement and wheelchair access.
The final bedroom ensuring ample space for all family members. Designed with Vastu principles in mind and wheelchair access.
A dedicated guest room that doubles as a study or additional space. Includes wheelchair access.
Secluded entertainment area with soundproofing and acoustics designed according to Chettinad style. Includes wheelchair access.
Two-car garage with ample space for vehicles and storage. Wheelchair accessible pathway provided.
Small utility room for domestic appliances and supplies, designed with accessibility in mind.

openings.description: Large entrance door with automatic opener and ramp to accommodate wheelchair users.
Windows providing ample natural light; placed as per Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
Robust double garage door with automatic opener and ramp access.
